connector.description:
Receive data from Google Pubsub reporting events related to a Google Storage bucket.

Service account key is the basic method for authenticating to the Google Pubsub and Google Storage.

To use this Kamelet you'll need to set up Events notification for your Google Storage Bucket.

You must encode the `serviceAccountKey` property before you pass it as a parameter.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: The Google Cloud Pub/Sub Project ID.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: The service account key to use as credentials for the Pub/Sub publisher/subscriber. You must encode this value in base64.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.synchronousPull
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: Specifies to synchronously pull batches of messages.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.maxMessagesPerPoll
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: The maximum number of messages to receive from the server in a single API call.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.concurrentConsumers
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: The number of parallel streams to consume from the subscription.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: The Google Cloud Storage bucket name or Bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based-source.getObject
camel.kamelet.google-storage-event-based.description: If getObject is enabled, then the file created in the Bucket will be get and returned as body, if not only the event will be returned as body.
